message_1: A company needs to deliver 50 packages to 5 different locations. Each location has a specific number of packages that need to be delivered. The delivery trucks can only carry up to 12 packages at a time. What is the minimum number of trucks needed to complete all deliveries?
message_2: To determine the minimum number of trucks needed, we need to know the number of packages required at each location. Please provide the number of packages for each of the 5 locations.
